body_html: If you do this in python, you might also want to implement the same logic in this C++ function: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/shape_refiner.cc#L356 (with tests) -- it's possible in C++ the else clause already handles this case, whereas in python it doesn't, but it would be good to make sure they are consistent.

body: If you do this in python, you might also want to implement the same logic in this C++ function: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/shape_refiner.cc#L356 (with tests) -- it's possible in C++ the else clause already handles this case, whereas in python it doesn't, but it would be good to make sure they are consistent.
